data.name: Godzilla vs. Hedorah : Japanese Audio with English Subtitles
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

From the pollution of mankind a new monster emerges from the sea— Hedorah, the Smog Monster! Spewing poisonous gas and growing stronger with the more it consumes, this creature soon takes to the land, destroying cities in its search for food. Now, Godzilla must save the day once again as Hedorah begins to undergo a series of transformations in order to find more toxic waste to feed its growing appetite.
data.about_the_game: From the pollution of mankind a new monster emerges from the sea— Hedorah, the Smog Monster! Spewing poisonous gas and growing stronger with the more it consumes, this creature soon takes to the land, destroying cities in its search for food. Now, Godzilla must save the day once again as Hedorah begins to undergo a series of transformations in order to find more toxic waste to feed its growing appetite.
data.short_description: From Earth’s pollution a new terror emerges— Hedorah, the Smog Monster! Seeking more toxic waste to feed its growing appetite, Hedorah makes its way to Japan, and only Godzilla can stop it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
